clues.text: The Conscience Fund, voluntary donations from people who believe they owe the U.S. money, is run by this Cabinet Dept.

One 1990 gift was for $155,502, but the fund began with a $5 donation in 1811 during the administration of this president
A religious vet sent $500 for stealing from the military, writing, "I am" one of these, "However, I was not always"

Drop & give me 2,220 of these, like world record holder Carlton Williams did in one hour in 2015

NFL prospects run this dash, roughly the distance they'd have to run to cover an average punt
This workout regimen that has trademarked "sport of fitness" calls its gyms "boxes"
Wood you like to hold this abdominal exercise position for 4 hours & 26 mins. like Mao Weidong did in 2014?

rounds.comments: (Alex: We want you to give us the play because we'll deal with...)

clues.text: The light breaks through yonder window, uh huh... "Her vestal livery is but sick and green"... How romantic!

Jealousy is a b--no, no, a monster, got it-- "That cuckold lives in bliss who, certain of his fate, loves not his wronger"

Triglycerides, a reserve of chemical energy, can be stored in these cells that mainly make up yellow marrow
Megakaryocytes are giant marrow cells that form the small blood cell fragments used in clotting called these
Chronic lymphocytic this, cancer of the bone marrow, may take 10 years to develop

rounds.text: A 1711 bill cleared the names of 22 people who were tried in this town, including Rebecca Nurse, Giles Corey & John Proctor
